context.rdfs:comment: Used to describe membership in a loyalty programs (e.g. "StarAliance"), traveler clubs (e.g. "AAA"), purchase clubs ("Safeway Club"), etc.

properties.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier for the membership.

properties.rdfs:comment: The organization (airline, travelers' club, etc.) the membership is made with.
properties.rdfs:label: hostingOrganization
